price: ߊ߲ ߓߘߊ߫ ߞߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߣߊ ߟߊߣߐ߲߰ߦߊ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
